post:
Hello guys,

This offer is a bit different than what I usually post. This offer is NOT related to drServer.net/VikingLayer.com. 

I have agreed to post it on behalf of a friend to help her fund her studies.
I have asked for permission in a ticket and it was approved by a LowEndTalk administrator.

My friend has a high-school degree in Graphics Design and is currently enrolled in a Psychology course. She has experience making logos for people for a few months.

_The Logo Design Offer Includes:_
Modern, Unique and Custom Design for your business
Reasonable Revisions Amount - negotiate that directly
Cheap Pricing
Quick Turn-Around Time

I am making a personal website to showcase the portfolio, but it's still a WiP, so for now contact can be made either through me or I can PM contact info if you are interested. When the website is ready, I will post it in this thread.

To claim the offer, send me a PM with the following information and I will forward it or provide contact details(depending on your wish):

Description of your business:
Name:
Desired Colors:
Website if you have any:
If you have any idea, how it should look like send a mockup:
If no, describe how would you want it to look like:

Payment method and way of payment is negotiable directly.

Thanks for your attention and have a good day!
